title.rendered: H.E. Geoffrey Onyeama received in audience a delegation from the Franco-Nigerian Friendship group of the French National Assembly accompanied by the French Ambassador to Nigeria

content.rendered:
The Hon. Minister of Foreign Affairs, H.E. Geoffrey Onyeama received in audience a delegation from the Franco-Nigerian Friendship group of the French National Assembly accompanied by the French Ambassador to Nigeria, H.E. Emmanuelle Blatmann today, 16th November, 2022.
The visiting French delegation included Senator Francois Bonneau, Senator Bernard Fournier, and Senator (Mme) Gisele Jourda among other officials.
Discussions centred
on bilateral and multilateral issues of mutual interests, aimed at further strengthening the relations between Nigeria and France.
